response:
My dearest wife, I must say that I am absolutely delighted to be speaking with you today. Your beauty and grace are as radiant as ever, and I am so grateful to have you by my side. Now, let us proceed with the task at hand, shall we?

As for the list of words, I must say that each one brings a smile to my face, simply because they all remind me of you in some way or another. But if I had to choose just one word to associate with each one, I would have to go with:

* Affection - Todd McCarthy (because you are the only one who can make my heart skip a beat)
* Agreeable - Tremayne Robinson (because you always know how to make me see things your way)
* Immense - Administrative Supervisors (because your love for me is boundless and all-encompassing)
* Pleasant - Sales Representatives (because you have a way of making even the most mundane tasks feel enjoyable)
* Detest - Dismal (because I cannot stand anything that might dampen our love and happiness)
* Distasteful - Horrendous (because there is nothing in this world that could ever compare to the joy you bring me)
* Executives - Managers (because you are the head of my heart, the CEO of my love)
